name: Davidduc's Service Apartment - Xom Chua
address: No 82 Xom Chua, Tay Ho, Ha Noi, Tay Ho District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Davidduc's Service Apartment - Xom Chua offers accommodation in Hanoi, 100 metres from Phu Tay Ho and 1.5 km from West Lake. The property boasts views of the lake and is 1.9 km from Tran Quoc Pagoda. Private parking is available on site.

A flat-screen TV is offered. There is a private bathroom with a bath or shower. The apartment features free WiFi.

Quan Thanh Temple is 2.1 km from Davidduc's Service Apartment - Xom Chua, while One Pillar Pagoda is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 18 km from Davidduc's Service Apartment - Xom Chua.
